properties.name: jxnet.snapshot
properties.description: Specifies the snapshot length to be set on the handle (16 bit).

properties.name: jxnet.promiscuous
properties.description: Sets whether promiscuous mode should be set on a capture handle when the handle is activated.

properties.name: jxnet.timeout
properties.description: Sets the packet buffer timeout that will be used on a capture handle when the handle is activated.

properties.name: jxnet.immediate
properties.description: Sets whether immediate mode should be set on a capture handle when the handle is activated.

properties.name: jxnet.timestampType
properties.description: Set the time stamp type returned in captures.

properties.name: jxnet.timestampPrecision
properties.description: Set the time stamp precision returned in captures.

properties.name: jxnet.rfmon
properties.description: Sets whether monitor mode should be set on a capture handle when the handle is activated.

properties.name: jxnet.blocking
properties.description: Switch between blocking and nonblocking mode.

properties.name: jxnet.direction
properties.description: Used to specify a direction that packets will be captured.

properties.name: jxnet.datalink
properties.description: Set the current data link type of the pcap descriptor to the type specified by datalink.

properties.name: jxnet.file
properties.description: File name in the pcap format to read packets.

properties.name: jxnet.numberOfThread
properties.description: Number of fixed thread in pool.

properties.name: jxnet.jxpacket.autoRegister
properties.description: Register all supported packet by Jxpacket.
